results.content: I gave 3 Star because i want to be very fair to the instructor... first he took a very bold step of teaching such an important course.. i think he's the only person teaching it on udemy.... but he had serious problem with his presentation... he wasn't audible enough... he taught as if he was talking to himself.... so he should improve his presentation.. but i got what i wanted from the course, though in a hard way
